mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST (PROD_ID, USER_EMAIL, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{prodId}, #{userEmail}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.PROD_ID, A.PROD_NAME, B.USER_EMAIL, D.PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, F.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME, A.PROD_PRICE, D.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID FROM PROD A, TBL_USER B, WISHLIST C, PROD_SUB_CATE D, PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE E, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE F WHERE A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.USER_EMAIL = C.USER_EMAIL AND A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = D.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID AND E.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND F.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = E.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND F.FILTER_OPTION_ID = 'BR' AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(A.PROD_NAME) as CNT FROM PROD A, TBL_USER B, WISHLIST C, PROD_SUB_CATE D, PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE E, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE F WHERE A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.USER_EMAIL = C.USER_EMAIL AND A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = D.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID AND E.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND F.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = E.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND F.FILTER_OPTION_ID = 'BR' AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{value}
